page.title: 16MR. RADWAY, THE BAKER.
page.content: {Mr. Radway}is a hard working man, who works 7 days a week. He starts work at 4 in the morning during week days but at weekends he works from l a.m. because more people require his bakery products. At night he makes his bread dough so that it is ready to bake the next morning. He started as a baker in the Second World War. Mr. Radway does not enjoy baking quite like he used to because of his bad legs. As a baker he is so experienced that he does not need to weigh out quantities of mixed fruit for cakes but can judge them by sight. Mr. Radway was once a keen and capable local cricketer and now enjoys watching the game on television.
